short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gathers Steam IDs and Names from the Steam Friends page, and compares with the last time it was run.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Steam Friends Tracker

Easily track and manage your Steam friends with this powerful Chrome extension! Whether you’re keeping an eye on your friends list for new additions or losses, this tool makes it simple to monitor changes over time.

Key Features:

● Scrape Steam Friends List: Automatically gather details like avatars, names, and SteamIDs from your Steam friends list.

● Track Gains and Losses: Instantly see which friends you’ve gained or lost since your last check.
Quick Comparisons: View side-by-side tables that highlight newly added or lost friends, with the option to clear the lists as needed.

● Clean and Simple Interface: A sleek, easy-to-use table format that focuses on what matters: your friends’ avatars, names, and SteamIDs, with no clutter or distractions.

● Automatic Data Storage: Data is stored locally for future comparisons, allowing you to see changes over time with ease.

Take control of your Steam friends list and stay informed with the Steam Friends Tracker. Perfect for those who want to easily keep track of changes without the hassle of manually checking!
